data.persona: I love god and his word. I have 10 copies of the bible. I am poor in money but rich in salvation.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrifice Chamber.
Bones of the damned riddle the floor and every surface inside the room. Blood stains are rampant on table like surface, surfaces once used for human sacrifices. A foul, but faint, odor pervades even the most hardiest of nostrils.
There's a table, two bones, a temple, a map, and a religious text here.
The priests is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to move the table.
data.mid_motivation: I need to make room for the sacrifice that the priests are making to appease the angry god.
data.long_motivation: I want to follow the religion and worship the god as faithfully as I can so that the current drought will end and the kingdom will be saved from starvation.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put table on corner of sacrifice chamber

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use religious text with sacrifice chamber altar
